pages.text: Chillberries can be found in the Taiga biome, and their bushes cause freezing.
This food item grants the $(#FF9900)Fire Resistance II$() effect for 45 seconds.

Mandrakes are found in Forests biomes. If you hold the RMB for a few seconds, the Mandrake will scream in a radius of 5 blocks, applying the $(#f1c232)Stunned$() effect to nearby entities.$(br2)Harvesting this crop can stun you for a few seconds if you are not protected.
This food item grants the $(#f1c232)Overfed$() effect for 45 seconds, this prevents saturation from lowering but it reduces your speed by 10%.
Sunfire Tomatoes can be found in Savannah biomes, and their bushes cause burning.
This food item grants the $(#bcbcbc)Speed II$() effect for 45 seconds.
Saltsprouts are found naturally in $(l:hexalia:world_gen/structures)Barren Hut$(), which spawns in Deserts.$(br2)This crop can only be planted in Sand or Infused Farmland.
Salt can be obtained from this item by crushing it in a Mortar & Pestle.

Galeberries are obtained through the $(l:hexalia:rituals/celestial_ritual)Celestial Rituals$() after infusing Glow Berries with celestial energy, these berries can be planted and grow from vines, similarly to Glow Berries.
This food item grants the $(#bcbcbc)Night Vision$() effect for 30 seconds.
